Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen to make cooking less stressful or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone.  Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting nerds at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top 10 Amazon deals right now, including an affordable laptop, one of our favorite beauty tools and Apple earbuds, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. Need gift ideas? We've got you covered there, too. 

► Holiday Gift Guide 2021:  100 amazing gifts for every type of person and budget

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 10 best Amazon deals you can get today

1. Save $70: Some of our favorite earbuds

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for one of the lowest prices we've ever seen. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $179—a $70 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $179 (Save $70)

2. 58% off: This multi-functional hair styling tool

Creating salon-quality hairstyles has never been easier with the Revlon One-Step hairdryer and volumizer. This cult-favorite hairstyling tool is one of our favorites (it earned an honorable mention!) and right now you can pick it up from Amazon for as little as $24.99, a $35 markdown. During testing, the volumizer cut our styling time in half and dried our locks from root to tip with minimal effort. 

Get the Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer Hot Air Brush from $24.99 with on-page coupon (Save $16.11 to $35)

3. Less than $15: These sport energy tablets

If you need an extra boost to get you through the toughest workouts, consider adding these Nuun Sport drink tablets to your water. You can get four 10-tablet tubes of citrus berry flavors for $11.35—a $16.61 price cut thanks to a $6.61 discount and an extra $10 on-page coupon. Nuun tablets are enhanced with electrolytes and no artificial flavoring or sweeteners. All you have to do is drop a tablet into your water bottle and let it dissolve to get a flavorful boost for your next run!

Get the Nuun Sport Electrolyte Drink Tablets 4-Pack for $11.35 with on-page coupon (Save $16.61)

4. 50% off: This affordable laptop

This HP 11-inch Chromebook is even more budget-friendly right now. Normally listed for $259.99, the 32-gigabyte computer is now available for just $129.99. HP says the Chromebook offers an anti-glare, high-definition touchscreen display with Android apps to add to your device. The laptop has technology fit for office work, online gaming and more. 

Get the HP 11-Inch 32 GB Chromebook for $129.99 (Save $130)

5. Less than $180: This smart robot vacuum

Robot vacuums can make your everyday cleaning a breeze, and right now the iRobot Roomba 692 is now available for $174.99—a 41% discount from its regular price tag of $299.99. We appreciated this great robot vacuum under $400 for its ability to sense and collect dirt and dust with its dual multi-surface brushes. iRobot says it can navigate under and around furniture and has a battery life of up to 90 minutes. 

Get the iRobot Roomba 692 for $174.99 (Save $125)

6. 33% off: These smartphone-friendly light bulbs

Lower your electric bill and bring new light to your home with these Kasa smart light bulbs. Normally listed for $29.99, this two-pack of 11-watt bulbs can be brought down to $19.99 by combining the current $5 discount with an extra $5 coupon on the product page. Kasa says you can set the bulbs to automatically change colors to match natural light patterns throughout the day and you can control the bulbs through the Kasa app on your smartphone or use voice-control interfaces including Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

Get the Kasa Smart Bulbs 1000 Lumens 2-Pack for $19.99 with on-page coupon (Save $10)

7. Less than $150: This race car-inspired gaming chair  

If you want to truly feel in the driver's seat of your favorite video game, the Respawn 200 chair can give you major comfort at a major discount. Normally $289.99, you can get the black version for as low as $148.17 thanks to a 48% price cut. Respawn says the ergonomic design, open-back seat structure, adjustable headrest and pivoting lumbar support all contribute to the chair's comfort. The developer also says the chair can recline between 90 and 130 degrees with a 360-degree swivel ability.

Get the Respawn 200 Racing Style Gaming Chair from $148.17 (Save $80 to $141.82)

8. Get 3 for the price of 2: These popular party games

If you're planning on hosting friends and family this holiday season, bring some fun to the living room with these popular party games. Right now, Amazon is offering three select games for the price of two. That means you can get the tense demolition of Jenga ($12.99), the strategic stacking of Connect 4 ($10.99) and the wild sentence structure of Cards Against Humanity ($25), normally $48.98 together, for just $37.99. 

Shop select party games and get 3 for the price of 2

9. Save $95: One of our favorite tablets

Right now you can get one of our favorite tablets for almost half off. Amazon's Fire HD 10 with 64 gigabytes of storage usually starts at $189.99, but you can get one for 50% off, bringing the price down to $94.99. We ranked the Fire HD 10 as one of the best tablets we've ever tested thanks to its large display, which is capable of playing 1080p-resolution videos with reasonably true colors and black levels, and the relatively quick charging time. Though it doesn't have the strongest app collection compared with the competition from Apple and Google, it's hard to beat its current discounted price.

Get the Amazon Fire HD 10 64 GB Tablet for $94.99 (Save $95)

10. 10% off: This compact coffee maker

Keurig is one of the most popular names in home coffee makers and the Keurig K-Supreme Plus is now available for $169.99—$20 off its listing price of $189.99. With a depth of only 13.3 inches, this sleek coffee maker lets you brew up to nine cups of joe before needing to refill the 78-ounce water reservoir. K-Cup pod users will find an easy interface on the Plus and the ability to save personal brewing preferences for up to three users in cup sizes from four to 12 ounces. 

Get the Keurig K-Supreme Plus Coffee Maker for $169.99 (Save $20)

5 Amazon deals you may have missed

1. SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless Mouse

If you're jumping into the world of PC gaming and need a high-quality mouse but don't want to spend a fortune, we recommend the SteelSeries Rival 3. The lightweight device is the wireless version of our favorite affordable gaming mouse, which impressed us with its easy maneuverability and solid build quality. It also has programmable buttons and customizable lighting accessible via the SteelSeries Engine 3 software. Even better, it had no accuracy issues despite its small size. Normally listed for $49.99, you can get the Rival 3 now for half off, at just $24.88.

Get the SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless Gaming Mouse for $24.88 (Save $25.11)

2. Cali White Activated Charcoal and Organic Toothpaste

Brighten up your pearly whites with this Cali White organic toothpaste for $8. Usually priced at $19.99 and already marked down to $8.99, you can get a four-ounce tube for an extra $0.99 off when you use coupon code 11COKT1U at checkout. Cali White says the toothpaste is fluoride-free with coconut oil, peppermint oil and more natural elements.

Get the Cali White Activated Charcoal and Organic Toothpaste for $8 with coupon code 11COKT1U (Save $11.99)

3. Bose Sleepbuds II

If you use relaxing sounds to help you get a good night's sleep, you want to check out the Bose Sleepbuds II. Normally listed for $249, these wireless earbuds designed to stay comfortably in place the whole night are now on sale for $199, thanks to a $50 price cut. When we tested the Sleepbuds II, we were impressed with how well the buds stayed put in our tester's ears overnight, and the battery life of around nine hours. While we wished we could access other forms of relaxing audio like sleep stories and guided meditations, users can find 39 white noise sounds through the Bose mobile app.

Get the Bose Sleepbuds II for $199 (Save $50)

4. LifeStraw Personal Water Filter, 2-Pack

Outdoor explorers on your gift list will surely appreciate the LifeStraw Personal water filter in their stocking this year. Typically priced at $39.95, you can get a two-pack of this slim camping accessory for $25.98. LifeStraw claims the straw can eliminate 99.9999% of waterborne bacteria and 99.9% of waterborne protozoan parasites. Wherever your next outdoor adventure takes you, LifeStraw promises it can filter up to 1,000 gallons of contaminated water. 

Get the LifeStraw Personal Water Filter, 2-Pack for $25.98 (Save $13.97)

5. TCL 55-Inch 5-Series 4K UHD Dolby Vision QLED Roku Smart TV

Save money without sacrificing quality with the TCL 5-Series televisions, on sale in various sizes now. The 4K UHD smart TV with built-in Roku technology starts for as low as $449.99 in its 55-inch size, which normally runs shoppers $699.99. The 5-Series is our pick for the best TV under $500, having wowed us with its bright and more colorful picture quality that beat other affordable screens on the market. The built-in technology from Roku (the makers of our favorite streaming device) also creates a user interface that's incredibly easy to use.

Get the TCL 55-Inch 5-Series 4K UHD Dolby Vision QLED Roku Smart TV for $449.99 (Save $250)
